NonZeroInt64.title: NonZeroInt64
NonZeroInt64.description: 64-bit signed integer, zero excluded. Ranges: -9223372036854775808..-1 and 1..9223372036854775807

MultiAsset.title: MultiAsset
MultiAsset.description: A mapping from policy IDs (script hashes) to mappings from asset names to amounts

oneOf.title: Metadata String
oneOf.description: UTF-8 string. Maximum size is 64 bytes, but there is no way to express byte length limit in a json-schema (maxLength limits the number of characters)

proposed_protocol_parameter_updates.title: ProposedProtocolParameterUpdates
proposed_protocol_parameter_updates.description: A mapping from GenesisHash to ProtocolParamUpdate

VRFKeyHash.title: VRFKeyHash
VRFKeyHash.description: blake2b_256 digest of a VRF verification key, encoded as bech32

URL.title: URL
URL.description: UTF-8 URL string. Maximum size is 64 bytes, but there is no way to express byte length limit in a json-schema (maxLength limits the number of characters)

oneOf.title: Move Instantaneous Rewards to stake credentials
Move Instantaneous Rewards to other Pot (reserves or treasury)

Mint.title: Mint
Mint.description: Minting or burning of assets. A mapping from policy IDs (script hashes) to mappings from asset names to amounts (that can be negative). Allows for duplicate script hash keys.

auxiliary_data_set.title: AuxiliaryDataSet
auxiliary_data_set.description: A mapping from transaction indices to AuxiliaryData values
